typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		CustomerKey as integer,
		CustomerID as integer,
		CustomerName as string,
		BillToCustomer as string,
		PrimaryContactPerson as string,
		PhoneNumber as string,
		FaxNumber as string,
		DeliveryPostalCode as string,
		ValidFrom as timestamp,
		ValidTo as timestamp,
		CurrentFlag as integer,
		cityID as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> customers
source(output(
		CityKey as integer,
		CityID as integer,
		CityName as string,
		Location as binary,
		LatestRecordedPopulation as long,
		LastEditedBy as integer,
		ValidFrom as timestamp,
		ValidTo as timestamp,
		CurrentFlag as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> cities
source(output(
		WWIOrderID as integer,
		CustomerID as integer,
		BackorderOrderID as integer,
		OrderDate as date,
		PickingDate as timestamp,
		StockItemID as integer,
		Description as string,
		Quantity as integer,
		UnitPrice as decimal(18,2),
		TaxRate as decimal(18,3),
		OrderKey as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> orders
source(output(
		StockItemKey as integer,
		StockItemID as integer,
		StockItemName as string,
		SupplierID as integer,
		ColorID as integer,
		UnitPackageID as integer,
		OuterPackageID as integer,
		Brand as string,
		Size as string,
		LeadTimeDays as integer,
		QuantityPerOuter as integer,
		IsChillerStock as boolean,
		Barcode as string,
		TaxRate as decimal(18,3),
		UnitPrice as decimal(18,2),
		RecommendedRetailPrice as decimal(18,2),
		TypicalWeightPerUnit as decimal(18,3),
		MarketingComments as string,
		InternalComments as string,
		Photo as binary,
		CustomFields as string,
		Tags as string,
		SearchDetails as string,
		LastEditedBy as integer,
		ValidFrom as timestamp,
		ValidTo as timestamp,
		CurrentFlag as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> stockitems
customers, cities join(customers@cityID == cities@CityID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 select(mapColumn(
		CustomerKey,
		CustomerID,
		CustomerName,
		BillToCustomer,
		PrimaryContactPerson,
		PhoneNumber,
		FaxNumber,
		DeliveryPostalCode,
		ValidFrom = customers@ValidFrom,
		ValidTo = customers@ValidTo,
		CurrentFlag = customers@CurrentFlag,
		CityKey,
		CityID = cities@CityID,
		CityName,
		Location,
		LatestRecordedPopulation,
		LastEditedBy,
		ValidFrom = cities@ValidFrom,
		ValidTo = cities@ValidTo,
		CurrentFlag = cities@CurrentFlag
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1, orders join(Select1@CustomerID == orders@CustomerID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join2
Join2 select(mapColumn(
		CustomerKey,
		CustomerID = Select1@CustomerID,
		CustomerName,
		BillToCustomer,
		PrimaryContactPerson,
		PhoneNumber,
		FaxNumber,
		DeliveryPostalCode,
		ValidFrom,
		ValidTo,
		CurrentFlag,
		CityKey,
		CityID,
		CityName,
		Location,
		LatestRecordedPopulation,
		LastEditedBy,
		WWIOrderID,
		CustomerID = orders@CustomerID,
		BackorderOrderID,
		OrderDate,
		PickingDate,
		StockItemID,
		Description,
		Quantity,
		UnitPrice,
		TaxRate,
		OrderKey
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select2
Select2, stockitems join(Select2@StockItemID == stockitems@StockItemID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join3
Join3 select(mapColumn(
		OrderKey,
		CityKey,
		CustomerKey,
		StockItemKey,
		WWIOrderID,
		OrderDate,
		PickingDate,
		BackorderOrderID,
		Description,
		Quantity,
		UnitPrice = Select2@UnitPrice,
		TaxRate = Select2@TaxRate
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select3
Select3 derive(TotalExcludingTax = UnitPrice*Quantity,
		TaxAmount = (UnitPrice*Quantity)*TaxRate,
		TotalIncludingTax = (UnitPrice*Quantity)*(1+TaxRate)) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		OrderKey as integer,
		CityKey as integer,
		CustomerKey as integer,
		StockItemKey as integer,
		WWIOrderID as integer,
		OrderDate as date,
		PickingDate as timestamp,
		BackorderOrderID as integer,
		Description as string,
		Quantity as integer,
		UnitPrice as decimal(18,2),
		TaxRate as decimal(18,3),
		TotalExcludingTax as decimal(18,3),
		TaxAmount as decimal(18,3),
		TotalIncludingTax as decimal(18,3)
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> fact
